title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra: If You Miss the Note, This Is Your Phone
sub_head: In addition to appealing to the most devoted Samsung nerds, the company added two smaller, more-affordable phones, the Galaxy S22+ and S22, to its flagship line
body:
It’s getting harder for phone makers to wow buyers. Samsung Electronics Co. hopes its latest models will stoke excitement in its most loyal fan base: users of its recently discontinued Galaxy Note.
The South Korean electronics company on Wednesday unveiled three additions to its smartphone lineup: the $800 Galaxy S22, $1,000 Galaxy S22+ and $1,200 Galaxy S22 Ultra. Many specs are similar to those of last year’s Galaxy S21 lineup—including the prices—but the new Ultra comes with something previously found only in the Note: a built-in slot for the included S Pen stylus.
